ticket.title: render :template doesn't work
ticket.original-body:
If I call render :template => "template" (which lives in app/views/template.html.erb) in my controller, I get the error, that the template doesn't exist. But it does, if I try the exact path the error message gives me. ;)
In my opinion, the error is here: actionpack/lib/action_view/template_finder.rb: 27: Dir.glob("#{dir}/**/*/**").each do |file|
My app: app/controllers/test_controller.rb: 1: class TestController < ApplicationController 2: def index 3: render :template => "template" 4: end 5: end app/views/template.html.erb: 1: It works!
My config: Ruby Edge of today ruby 1.8.6 (2007-09-24 patchlevel 111) [i486-linux] (from the Ubuntu Hardy repository)
